sep=: As any user of the site, I would like to search the database for anything. This search feature is valuable because it gives search capabilities to any user of the site, casual and hardcore fans alike.
As a casual fan, I would like to sort coaches by name (A-Z or Z-A). This is a valuable sort because it introduces some order to the list of coaches.
As a casual fan, I would like to sort coaches by team name (A-Z or Z-A). This is a valuable sort because it introduces some order to the coaches list.

As a casual user, I would like to sort the seasons by year (past-to-present or present-to-past). This is valuable because it allows for a chronological reading (whether backward or forward) of the seasons.
As a casual fan, I would like to sort the teams by their current rank (ascending and descending). This is valuable because I would like to know which team is considered the best this season.
As a casual fan, I would like to sort the teams by name (A-Z and Z-A). This is a valuable sorting option because it introduces some order to the list of teams.

As any user, I would like to see any result of any query in pages. This is a valuable feature because it prevents the user from waiting too long for their results to appear instead presenting them with a few good results per page.
As a casual fan, I would like to see the players sorted by teams (A-Z and Z-A). This is a valuable sort because it introduces some order to the player list.
As a casual fan, I would like to see the players in alphabetical order (A-Z and Z-A). This is a valuable feature because it introduces some order to the results.
As a super fan, I want to be able to see all the Defensive Coordinators. This is a valuable filter because I would like to know who is/was leading every team.
As a super fan, I would like to know all the Offensive Coordinators. This is a valuable filter because who is/was leading every team.
As a fan, I want to see all the coaches in a particular team. This is an important filter because I would like to see all coaches, not just a specific coach, for a team.
As a casual fan, I want to see which seasons were won by which conference. This is an important filter because I am a fan of one particular conference (AFC/NFC).
As a casual fan, I want to see which teams are winning or losing in this season. This is an important filter because I would like to know who to root for or who would be a good underdog to cheer for.
As a fan of the sport, I would like to know all the Head Coaches. This is important because I would like to know who is/was leading every team. This is a filtering issue.
As a casual user, I want to be able to filter players by team. This is valuable because I would like to know all the players in my favorite team.
